name: Only 1 Frame Per Second - Puzzle Game
name_original: Only 1 Frame Per Second - Puzzle Game
description:
Only 1 FPS

This game is made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 the theme was only one.

The game only has 1 FPS, The goal is to get to the flag at the end of each level. 

CONTROLS: 

Press R: Reset a level & start over

Directional Arrows /WASD :  move 

ONLY 1 FRAME PER SECOND

ONLY 1 INVENTORY SPACE

ONLY 1 ACTION PER FRAME

Features:

  • Keys unlock doors                           
  • Swords allow you to defeat enemies
  • Shields protect you from projectiles in 1 direction
  • When stepping on ice, you will continue sliding (you can still look around)
  • cracked ground can only be stood on for 1 frame

              

Every action only happens once per frame, so plan out your movement accordingly, sometimes you can use the 1 fps movement to your advantage and manoeuvre around projectiles

Enjoy and let us know how far you got :D
